price: 12. Avant eux, avaient déjà crié au mensonge les peuples de Noé, des ‘Ad et de Pharaon (qui avait inventé le supplice) des épieux;
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
